body:
This video shows just how blind some advices players are. Sometimes the best way to go is straight through the middle of the map... (featuring: xHeat, Sfkwww, and JKawesome)

This is probably the shortest video on my channel... Hope you enjoy!

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c_3sQyKVG0M

replies.body: Haha. Some players are so oblivious. I broke a monument by standing on it in the middle of 6 diamond guys on Frostbite, once.
